    Description

    OperettaManager.Builder.coordinatesCorrectionFactor(double correction_factor)
     
    OperettaManager.Builder
    OperettaManager.Builder.flipHorizontal(boolean isFlip)
    Flip the individual tiles Horizontally.
    OperettaManager.Builder
    OperettaManager.Builder.flipVertical(boolean isFlip)
    Flip the individual tiles Vertically.
    OperettaManager.Builder
    OperettaManager.Builder.reader(IFormatReader reader)
    As an alternative to using an id, when the dataset is big, one can provide am already existing reader, which is a way to optimise the opening of a dataset
    OperettaManager.Builder
    OperettaManager.Builder.setId(File id)
    This sets the id (the path to the image file), as per Bioformat's definition In the case of Operetta Data, the ID is the 'Index.idx.xml' file you get when you export it.
    OperettaManager.Builder
    OperettaManager.Builder.setNormalization(int min, int max)
    Sets the values for min-max normalization In the case of digital phase images, these are in 32-bits and ImageJ cannot mix 32-bit images with 16-bit images (the standard Operetta bit depth).
    OperettaManager.Builder
    OperettaManager.Builder.setProjectionMethod(String method)
    The projection method to use
    OperettaManager.Builder
    OperettaManager.Builder.setRange(HyperRange range)
    Can provide a range (Channels, Slices and Timepoints) to use for export.
    OperettaManager.Builder
    OperettaManager.Builder.setSaveFolder(File save_folder)
    Provides the save folder to which data will be exported to
